sentences.cn: 不要受广告的宣传影响.

sentences.en: Don't let television commercials brainwash you into buying anything you actually don't need.
sentences.cn: 别让电视广告引诱你购买自己实际不需要的东西.

sentences.en: They brainwash people into giving up all their money.
sentences.cn: 他们向人们强行灌输放弃所有钱财的思想。

words.tran_cn: 对…洗脑；把思想强行灌输给（brainwash的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: If you brainwash someone, you force them to believe something by continually telling them that it is true, and preventing them from thinking about it properly

trans.tran_cn: <贬>对…进行洗脑，把某种思想强加于，通过宣传灌输说服
